Service

Comprehensive Clinical Assessment

Each person is assessed to appropriately identify his/her needs/problems and if appropriate, the needs of the family of the person. A clinical screening/assessment/evaluation is conducted on each individual who presents himself/herself for services and/or is referred for assessment, treatment, or evaluation to determine appropriateness for admission and disposition/referral for additional treatment services.

Request Appointment
Each person is assessed to appropriately identify his/her needs/problems and if appropriate, the needs of the family of the person. A clinical screening/assessment/evaluation is conducted on each individual who presents himself/herself for services and/or is referred for assessment, treatment, or evaluation to determine appropriateness for admission and disposition/referral for additional treatment services.


Request An Appointment


 

Substance Abuse Counseling and Outpatient Treatment (SACOT)

Strengthening Self-Confidence

 

Substance Abuse Intensive Outpatient Program (SAIOP)

Instilling Hope

 

Case Management

Individualized and Person-Centered


We will apply the right treatment for you.

Call us today at (919) 269-9300


What to expect

  • Personalized intake to understand your goals and needs
  • Clear care plan with measurable milestones
  • Coordinated support from our clinical team
  • Regular progress check-ins and adjustments

FAQ

How do I start Comprehensive Clinical Assessment?

Call us or request an appointment and our team will guide you through next steps.

Do you accept insurance?

We can verify benefits and review coverage options before you begin.

What does scheduling look like?

We offer flexible scheduling based on clinical needs and availability.
